projects.title: Personal Website & Blog
projects.description: A personal website/blog built with Astro and React. Currently, the project is nothing more than a personal small website used for testing interesting ideas and honing my skills.

projects.title: Task Set Generator for evaluating distributed, real-time scheduling algorithms
projects.description: My Bachelors thesis project. This software generates task set with configurable boundaries for the purpose of testing novel scheduling algorithms.

projects.title: Simple backend for a Raspberry Pi mounting a DHT22 sensor
projects.description: A simple backend that provides a REST API for a Raspberry Pi mounting a DHT22 sensor as well as a simply frontend to display the data.
